description: My place is close to Your Airbnb is located in an original brownstone in the heart of Bedford-Stuyvesant. You’ll love my place because of the renovated full bathroom has a deep tub for a relaxing bath.You’ll love my place because the kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher, large fridge and stove/oven. Kitchen has eating and cooking utensils.  My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and big groups.
name: Quiet and Large 1 Bedroom
review: Helen's place was great! Definitely true NY living. I would definitely stay again. The people in the next building were a little loud but that's apartment living for you at its best. MacDonough Cafe has a great light breakfast and a great view for people watching. The exterior needs a little maintenance but nothing to discourage you. It is an original brownstone so of course things are a little older. The place was clean and I felt very secure with my stay. Quick response time from the Management Company and Host. I definitely enjoyed my short stay.
